title.rendered: Donald Trump- A Controversial Part of Cannes Film Festival- Not in Person But Portrayed in New Film  ‘American Comedy’

content.rendered:
Award winning Official Poster for American Comedy

Producer Alex Ayzin created satire of the Donald’s political life
with Oscar nominee Eric Roberts

Our mission is to make America and the World laugh, not fight. Make laughter not war! Unbiased equal opportunity political satire makes everyone laugh.”

— Ukrainian born Alex Ayzin film’s producer

BEVERLY HILLS, CA, US, May 14, 2024 /EINPresswire.com/ — Pete Allman’s portrayal of Donald Trump in ‘ American Comedy’ with veteran actor Dan Lauria (The Wonder Years & Pitch) as the Pope, was hard work. Eric Roberts as the mob boss is unique. Creator/ Producer Alex Ayzin and Writer/Producer Spencer Cadigan have created a cinematic satire of the Donald political life.

With no fear or hesitation, Trump finds himself learning on the job as he plods along his collision course with other political leaders creating one debacle after another.

Politics becomes comedy as each character offers their own set of idiosyncratic circumstances.

Film is centered on Donald’s visit to Los Angeles where he comes to improve his standing with California voters.

The plot has Donald visiting Mexican taco stands, Russian, Chinese and Persian restaurants to sample ethnic foods in order to connect with local communities and improve his image.

At the restaurants he also meets with world leaders.

Donald’s wife Melania (portrayed by Marianna Trofimova) gives him a hard time and slaps him for being overweight.

“Your film is funny. Your guy (Peter Allman) does a good job portraying Donald.

This comedy film should be made into a television series”- — David Zucker, Director/Producer of Airplane, The Naked Gun, Top Secret, Scary Movie.

“I am very happy with this first showing. Audiences really loved this comedy. This is the movie that creates Peace through Humor”. Eric Zuley, Founder/ CEO eZWay TV.

“Great movie, man!… Great movie!” – Flash Bugatti, Actor/ Producer, Influencer.

“ A sense of humor will help …forget the politics for once and have a good time”, Lou Ferrigno, International film/ TV star and Academy voting member.

“American Comedy” delivers on their promise to ‘’Make America laugh again.” A film created to promote world peace, the filmmakers’ goal is to get people to laugh together and be nice to each other, especially during elections.”, Marie Adler, CEO of Adler and Associates Entertainment (AAE)

Ukrainian born Alex Ayzin and the film’s producer says: “Our mission is to make America and the World laugh, not fight. Make laughter not war! Unbiased equal opportunity political satire makes everyone laugh”.

Final notes:

As of this Press Release date, there has been no response from Moscow about Putin’s portrayal by Marty Ryan (Young Sheldon). Reaction to this film sent through proper diplomatic channels is expected.

There is also a TV series spin-off of American Comedy in pre-production entitled ‘Donald’s World’. See www.amcofilms.com

AAE buyers’ screenings at Marché du Film – Festival de Cannes 2024:

Friday, May 17, 05:30 pm, RIVIERA 2 – ‘AMERICAN COMEDY’

Email Marie Adler for more information on screenings. On location now arrived in Cannes

Marie-Adler@AdlersProductions.com

Media Inquires “American Comedy Screening and future: Edward Lozzi & Associates PR Beverly Hills epl@lozzipr.com

EDWARD Lozzi
EDward Lozzi & Associates Public Relations
+1 310-922-1200
email us here

You just read:

News Provided By

May 14, 2024, 06:23 GMT
